articles.description: Rory McIlroy continued a trend by not speaking to reporters after an otherwise great day ended in disappointment when he whiffed a chip shot.
articles.content:
Editor's note: For the latest news, updates and highlights from Round 2 of the U.S. Open, follow along here.
LOS ANGELES The questions keep piling up for Rory McIlroy.

articles.author: Vincent Goodwill
articles.title: Nikola Jokić validated his status among NBA greats. Now, he can embrace the spotlight it brings - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: What does Jokić owe the game, if anything? Does he owe the game more than his on-floor performance?
articles.content:
Nikola Joki soaked in the love, felt the vibes and unexpectedly was happy to spend parade day in Denver.
The Finals MVP, for once, allowed himself to live in the moment the past couple of days, show… [+6645 chars]
